sub_title: Executive coach/guide | Insead | Systemic/shamanistic facilitator | Team coach
summary:
Go deep with both feet on the ground

https://nitawink.nl/en/

Convinced that the world is a better place when leaders connect with their ‘essence’ I coach professionals in connecting head, heart and soul to create freedom, gain more energy, become more effective and connect with their source.

And through systemic work with horses I support individuals and groups to understand what drives their and behaviour and remove limiting beliefs. When we follow the wisdom and movement of the herd it always brings us to the essence!   

Contact me if you are interested in co-creating a program that brings you or your organisation to it’s essence. 

During my 20+year career at a Big4 audit company, of which 9 years as Client Partner, I led various assignments in former conflict areas. I worked with businesses and non–profit organizations in challenging circumstances in countries like Afghanistan, Haiti and Somalia. I studied in the Netherlands, Costa Rica and France. Along the way, I have met many inspiring people, heard some unforgettable stories, and learned a lot about myself. All these experiences have made me who I am, and they are all valuable in my work as a systemic coach and facilitator. 

In my voluntary board member roles for Skateistan and Mama Cash I support these organisations in making a difference in the lives of girls, women, trans and intersex people around the world.

"Remember what you might have forgotten"

Gain insight into who you really are, what really drives you and discover the full power of yourself or your team.

YOU KNOW THERE IS MORE TO LIFE
Being loyal to yourself and the expectations of the world around you has gotten you where you are today. That is beautiful. At the same time you feel that you have more to offer. That you are not (yet) living from your deepest core and potential.

FREE YOURSELF (OR YOUR TEAM) FROM LIMITING PATTERNS
You don't need to be fixed. We are not going to tell you what to do or change. Everything you need is already available. We help you to make space for your own strength by understanding and tackling limiting beliefs and patterns. So that you can live in freedom and in connection with your body, heart and ambition. As an individual and as a team.

Do you want to get moving, without doing it alone? Then we invite you to take responsibility for your life. Contact me.", 'title': '(Team) coach and facilitator', 'employment_type': 'Self-employed'}, {'location': 'netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'inzicht.nu', 'description': 'EQUINE ASSISTED SYSTEMIC WORK 
If we follow the wisdom and movement of the horses, they always bring us to the core! Without judgment and out of love, touching exactly that which needs attention and energy.

That is why we like to work with the systemic wisdom of horses. Everyone is part of different systems, such as family, work, group of friends, society, the world population. These systems have both conscious and unconscious influence on our behavior and feelings. With the help of the horses, our patterns can be made visible. Horses are herd animals and flight animals and they continuously sense what is needed to ensure that a situation is safe and optimal. This means that horses are completely in the here and now. From that power, horses show us people which themes are at play and what needs attention in which order. As a horse coach, we indicate what the horses show and how this relates to the individual and/or the team. Constantly contacting the inner compass of the individual. Bringing awareness to the invitation to take steps. By appointing representatives in the place of something or someone in the system, it is possible to restore and heal the balance.

Based on this wisdom of the horses, we work together with teams, groups, families and individual themes. [{'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'role': 'Co-chair of International Advisory Board', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Skateistan', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E0BAQGcJdsgNcGfRQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1687863351956?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=C_wGfChzVF6JFKI_MVITDviTp_2N02uH-v1LNcz6dNQ', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/skateistan/'}, 'cause': 'CHILDREN', 'description': 'Skateistan is an award winning non-profit organization. Through the innovative programs children build the skills and confidence, to create a brighter future for themselves and their communities. 

Skateistan believes that positive social change happens when children are educated on how to take care of themselves and their communities. The programs are for children aged 5 to 17 with a focus on girls, children living with a disability, and children from low income backgrounds. 

Project sites are in Kabul and Mazar-e-Sharif, Afghanistan; Phnom Penh, Cambodia; and Johannesburg, South Africa. Its international headquarter is in Berlin, Germany.
